tarot.appDescription: Discover your mystical insights with our AI-powered Web3 tarot reading experience. Connect your wallet to begin your cosmic journey.
tarot.connectWalletDescription: Connect your Phantom (Solana) or Metamask wallet to explore the mysteries of the cosmos through our Web3 tarot experience
tarot.deck1Description: The original mystical crypto-themed tarot deck
tarot.deck2Description: Coming soon: A cosmic journey through the stars
tarot.intentionDescription: Enter a question or focus for your reading. Be specific for more meaningful insights.
tarot.intentionPlaceholder: What would you like to know about your journey?
tarot.preparingYourReading: The universe is aligning to reveal your path...
tarot.selectCardsDescription: Choose 3 cards that call to your energy. You've selected {{selected}} of {{total}}.
tarot.revealCardsDescription: Click on each card to reveal its mystical meaning for your journey.
tarot.readingCompleteDescription: The cosmic energies have revealed these insights for your journey.
tarot.enterIntention: Please enter your intention or question
tarot.question: Question

errors.walletNotInstalled: wallet is not installed. Please install it to continue.
errors.phantomConnectionFailed: Error connecting to Phantom. Verify your wallet is open.
errors.metamaskConnectionFailed: Error connecting to MetaMask. Verify your wallet is open.
